entry.name: string11
entry.label: Text
entry.help: Input with list of values. List is not compulsory, it's only hint. Output in extras group.

entry.name: bool1
entry.label: Switcher
entry.help: Switcher fo boolean value. There is 3 states yes/no/not set. This switcher has mandatory value, so if switch as not set became inconsistent.

entry.name: string12
entry.label: Email
entry.help: This input is for email value. Value si not mandatory but if is set must match with regexp.

entry.name: number2
entry.label: Number
entry.help: Number with maximum at 0.8. Step is 0.002.

entry.name: string2
entry.label: Text
entry.help: String with selecto of values. Output in extras group extras.

entry.name: fuzzy2
entry.label: Fuzzy
entry.help: Fuzzy values. Output in extras group.

entry.name: string1
entry.label: Text
entry.help: Mutliple value text. Entry count 1-3. Value is mandatory.
